name: shaclib-ts
author: Vladimir Djurdjevic <vladimirdjurdjevic93@gmail.com>
description: TypeScript implementation of the evolving W3C Shapes Constraint Language (SHACL)

scripts.rebuild: yarn run clean && yarn run build
scripts.prepublish: yarn run lint && yarn run rebuild
scripts.test: concurrently -s first -k -n Fuseki,Tests "yarn run start:fuseki" "wait-port 3030 && yarn run start:tests"
